alert.note: Alert for Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 12 at 2:13PM AKDT until October 12 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...High surf and coastal erosion expected. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Coastal erosion is expected due to waves. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels 2 to 3 feet above the normal high tide line will diminish by this evening. West winds to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph will cause waves to crash onto the beach and push water into low lying areas inland from the beach. Winds and wave action will diminish by this evening.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property. Residents should pull possessions well off the beach.
